cast.overview: The incredible true story behind the most controversial Italian court cases in recent years. Stefano Cucchi was arrested for a minor crime and mysteriously found dead during his detention. In one week's time, a family is changed forever.
cast.title: On My Skin

details.biography: Chess trained at The Royal Conservatoire of Scotland where she performed as Hamlet in her final year, she then went on to work extensively in theatre, most notably for the National Theatre and Bristol Old Vic's UK tour of Jane Eyre. Chess was born to Barbara and Richard Tomlinson in Newcastle and is the eldest of four siblings.
details.name: Francesca Tomassoni
